Player History
Had first career hit on 4/11/1987, off Britt Burns (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1987, off Jay Baller (CHC)...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,750,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,750,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,750,000 through salary arbitration...
11/1/1991: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $3,730,000 per year, for 3 years.
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 6/21/1992...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/1992, hitting .412 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/1992, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 7/5/1993 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
